Class GameState

java.lang.Object
  GameState

public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object

This singleton contains the state of the game, represented by objects used globally in the game. It contains the current Map object, Units object, MainWindow object, the Player objects, the AI object and the time since the game started, in milliseconds.

Author:
Martin T. Sandsmark
